sentence: Here are the Senate and House races to watch: Walker in the home stretch With an endorsement from Trump and an enduring celebrity from his days as a star running back for the University of Georgia Bulldogs then in the NFL, Herschel Walker is widely expected to win the Georgia GOP nomination to challengeWarnock, who is running for a complete term after winning a runoff special election that helped give Democrats their narrow control of the Senate in January 021.

sentence: Federal and state campaign records show the GOP candidates backed by the former president spent tens of thousands of dollars at the private club, and Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker spent nearly $200,000 there so far during the election cycle, including a payment of more than $135,000 in December and about $65,000 last month, reported CNBC.
